reviews.review_msg: I enjoyed Dr. HR's class! She's pretty funny, and generally tries to illuminate difficult to understand concepts. Sometimes I wish her lectures were less discussion-based and more lecture-heavy, since it could go off the rails. Her grading is pretty fair, and she gives really good feedback. Her criteria is usually pretty clear

He's clever alright,but his lectures were sometimes a bit superficial - too many exams, too much stress on passage identification - this is philosophy, we're supposed to be thinking and writing.Still, he's young.And a real looker - worth it just for that!
Seems a little less confident in this class than in his lower-division classes.  The class can be a little confusing.

Very helpful and knowledgeable. Lectures can go a little slow some days depending on the topic and the people in your class. Basically do the readings and ask questions. If there is something that you don`t understand he will help you.
....smart, helpful, inspiring, knowledgable, and a little hot (for an old guy).
great prof! on the last day of the semester everyone stood up clapping for him! has a lot of interest towards his class and a great sense of humor.
Oh, you know... Personable, fair, a good sense of humour, and keeps the material interesting.
